vi: Toàn bộ tòa nhà đều như thế. Có tổng cộng gần 300 người.

 Yeah.

Make yourself at home.

Cứ tự nhiên như ở nhà.

What?

pa: -You don't think your son has a mind of his own?

en: Nie rozumiem, wytłumacz mi, jak chłopak, który…

was found dead in the forest?

pa: Record?

Piotrek?

Piotrek ư?

pa: Solid proof of their dirty deals.

I'm sorry, but…
 I don't have any mugs.

I know.
 ♪ Blue, clouded gray ♪

♪ Dizzy and weakened by the haze ♪
I want to go there.

pa: -We have nothing to lose.
No, no, no, no, no. Please!

pa:
-Hey! Hey! Hey.
 Hey.

pa: He took up all the space.

pa: I broke that child.

pa: No.

 Piotrek?

 Piotrek?

À, Piotruś.
 Các bạn chú muốn gặp cháu.

-Yeah?
 Hup.
